modName: Sword of the Seeker DSR Patch
summary: A Dual Sheath Redux patch for FavoredSoul's Sword of the Seeker mod.
descriptionHtml:
The Sword of Truth is a weapon that should not be hidden just because it's sheathed in the off-hand slot. This patch fixes that. What you need to know is right here in the description, so make sure you read it before asking questions or reporting any issues.

This patch requires FavoredSoul's original mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59331/?]Sword of the Seeker[/url].
This patch also requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155/?]Dual Sheath Redux[/url] by Neovalen.

In order for this patch to work properly, after downloading make sure you run the Dual Sheath Redux patcher. To be absolutely sure the mod is being patched, delete your existing Dual Sheath Redux Patch.esp and re-run the patcher!

Once that's completed, load the game and place the sword in the left-hand slot. Enjoy!

If you choose to endorse this patch, please show the original author some love and endorse the original mod as well!
author: k4tonic
